CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Alliance to run this profile!
Choose a Brewery or Den. Brewery has a 20% XP Boost.\nBoth are developed.
Jump in the chair and kill stuff\nDon't go far, you have another userdialog soon
Talk to The Effify and Kill stuff

End of Dev Profile. Development from here. 
Yes, you read correctly. There are no more quests after this message. 

Don't post on forums and ask.
I'm serious, there's no more quests.
